<title level="1" right="Rules">[Ancestry](/Rules.aspx?ID=3286)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
An ancestry is the broad family of people that a character belongs to. Ancestry determines a character's starting [Hit Points](/Rules.aspx?ID=2320), [languages](/Rules.aspx?ID=2095), [senses](/Rules.aspx?ID=2405), and [Speed](/Rules.aspx?ID=2347), and it grants access to ancestry feats. Ancestries can be found in [Chapter 2](/Rules.aspx?ID=2074).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
